column4: Question, Trying to access a windows workgroup, saying it can not retrieve share list from server... ??
double check with the 'findsmb' and 'smbtree' commands. I also somdeiomts have to enter the whole URL to the share.  ie: smb://server/sharename
End goal is to see Upnp servers, would I do that the same way?
Upnp is handled totally different then samba/smb
